phyir na der 'gro ba/ /tshangs pa yis kyang mi thob pas/ /gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams/ /der 'gro yod pa yong ma yin/ /ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed/ /stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang / /rnal 'byor can

gyi gnas kyi mchog /de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur/ /sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyi yul/ /rnal 'byor can gnas stug po de/ /'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos/ /de nas byung bas rnam par bsnyad/ /sna tshogs tshig 'di

thos pa ni/ /thub can rdo rje snying po yi/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis/ /gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig /mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan
dang / /gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /thub pa'i bka' ni ma lus par/ /smra bar su zhig nus pa yod/ /gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /thub chen thub pa bsnams pa dag /sangs rgyas yul ni
bsam mi khyab/ /mchog gi gtso bo sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la/ /su yis ji ltar bstan par nus/ /mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang / /dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras po dag /gcig pa'i

dbyangs su yang smras te/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras/ /rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dpal dang / /byams pa mi 'am ci yi bdag /rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de ni/ /de dag smra ba smros shig sgrogs/ /

nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste/ /lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang / /de nas shin tu rnga brdungs pa/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras/ /de dag de skad smra ba na/ /thor tshugs can gyi tshangs pa 'ongs/

sa 'khod kun las smras pa ni/ /stan gyi mchog la 'dug nas de/ /ngo mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhig /thub pa rnams kyi tshogs 'khor na/ /rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang / /slob ma mkhas pa de dag kyang / /khyu mchog thub

la 'dri bar 'dod/ /rgyal sras rdo rje dbang po la/ /skabs 'di ji zhig su zhig la/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa yin/ /ku ru'i bu dang di li pa/ /'khor lo 'khor ba man mtha' ta/ /yang na yo ba na shwa la/ /lha rdzas mi yi
gtam brjod dam/ /gnyi bu ig shwa ku la 'am/ /de bzhin gzhu stong bdog pa la 'am/ /'on tam gnas srung po la 'am/ /'khor lo 'khor ba gzhan dag la'am/ /'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med la'am/ /'du shes
med gnas gnas pa la'am/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnam shes sam/ /'on te cung zad med pa dag /thub chen rang sangs rgyas dag la'am/ /nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras la 'am/ /sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa yi/ /

rgyal dbang rnams la gtam 'di 'am/ /'di ci lha min lha rdzas sam/ /'on te skar ma'i de bzhin nam/ /ji ltar gyur pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /bdag cag slob ma phyogs su nyan/ /bla ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang / /rgyal

ba'i sras po thams cad dag /phan tshun shin du dpyod par byed/ /de yi ting 'dzin 'gro song rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig thos pa/ /thor tshugs can las mngon du ste/ /slob mar bcas par nyan 'dod pa/ /gtsang gnas

bdag po nyid kyang yin/ /thar zla blo gros mi zad dang / /nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /mthu chen spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /rnal 'byor shes pa gzungs kyi dbang / /lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang / /gtsug na

rin chen blo gros shing / /lag na rdo rje zhi ba'i blo/ /lag na rin chen blo chen dang / /'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag kyang / /bye ba'i zhing rnams kun nas 'ongs/ /rdo rje'i snying po blo can la/ /de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas/ /

pad mo'i stan la 'khod pa'i rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras la gsol ba 'debs/ /blo chen rab tu bshad par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul/ /da ltar byung ba'i gang tshig kyang / /rgyu dang

dpe yis rab gsal bar/ /khyod kyi zhal nas byung ba rnams/ /gdon myi za ba'i tshig 'di yang / /khyod kyis rgyal ba de zhal nas/ /thams cad ma lus thos pa ste/ /skyon med de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen/ /ting 'dzin dbang

sgyur rgyal po yis/ /thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas/ /rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis/ /rnal 'byor can la tshig smras pa/ /rgyal ba'i gsung rab ma lus par/ /smra bar sus kyang nus pa med/ /de yi byin

brlabs ma gtogs par/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal te/ /sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dag /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang / /dbang sgyur gnas bzang 'khod
rnams la 'ang / /ye shes dad pas smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rigs byed tshul yin te/ /nga las 'di dag thams cad nyon/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes dge/ /rgyal po rnams la gtam 'di min/ /mi bdag mchog
rnams 'das pa 'ang / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtam/ /stug dkyil phun sum tshogs rnams kyi/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi

ye shes phra/ /rtog med rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /so so rang rig mkhas pa'i yul/ /brjod pa dang ni rnam par bral/ /de ni smra bar dad pa med/ /bdag gis de yi mthus thos pa/ /lha rdzas kyi ni ye shes dang / /ting nge

'dzin gyi me tog gis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa ni/ /stug po'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag pas/ /thams cad phyogs las rnam grol zhing / /yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral/ /

dbu ma'i lam ni dge ba ste/ /gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha rdzas tshul/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par byed/ /dbu ma'i lam po de nyid kyang / /mtha' bzhi rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rnam par rtog med dmyigs med pa/ /stug na

gnas pas shin du mthong / /thub chen de nyid lam shes pa/ /bdag med ye shes mkhas rnams kyis/ /bla ma'i tshig 'di thos pa dang / /rnal 'byor can rnams thams cad kyang / /rkang pa gnyis la mnyam btud nas/ /

rdo rje zhes la smras pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can rnams nyan par brtson/ /skom pa rnams ni chu tshol bzhin/ /khyod kyi zhal nas btung 'dod pa/ /tshig gi sbrang rtsi bung ba bzhin/ /rnal 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs/ /
rgyal ba'i sras rnams shin du nyan/ /rnal 'byor can rnams rnal 'byor blo/ /ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen rnams/ /zhing gi bdag po rgyal chen rnams/ /rnal 'byor lam la rtog byed pa/ /bde gshegs bka'

ni nyan par ro/ /khyod kyi zhal nas rnam byung ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra/ /khong du chud byed mtshan bzang dang / /tshangs pa'i yang dag gshegs pa dang / /dbang po'i don grags khyad par du'o/ /

sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung / /sgra yi don la mkhas pa yi/ /de phyir bdag ni smrar ma mos/ /brtag bya rtog pa rnam par spangs/ /bar snang ri mo ji bzhin dang / /grib ma stong la sogs pas spangs/ /de ste
snang na rmad du rung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'/ /mkha' la bya rjes ji bzhin du/ /blta bar shin du dkon pa bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'/ /de ni bstan par mi nus so/ /
sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis/ /dpe yis kun du rab bstan kyis/ /dpe dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /thub pa'i zhal nas rnam par 'byung / /de yi tshig la dpe med de/ /rmi lam lta bur bdag la

snang / /rab rib mgal pa bskor ba dang / /skra yi tshogs dang de bzhin 'dra/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i grong khyer dang / /rlung ni shin du blta dka' dang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs/ /
'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs pa/ /thub pa'i gsung ni de bzhin te/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor can dbus su/ /bshad par de phyir dad pa med/ /'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste/ /de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i

rnams/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa/ /de phyir smra bar dad pa med/ /'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams/ /sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i

bka'/ /dpe med sems dang yid las rnam par 'das/ /ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing / /lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin/ /snying ku thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs te/ /de yi 'thungs
lhag bdag gis de ring bshad/ /de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang / /bstan par nus pa ma yin la/ /lha yi lha yi yul yin te/ /mkhas rnams dge ba 'phel bar byed/ /mi yi gzugs su byas nas su/ /sangs rgyas

shes ni mtshan ldan pa/ /cod pan can dang gzhan la snang / /gzhal med khang gnas gzhan la yang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /mtshan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /sa la sna tshogs snang ba ni/

mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel/ /dus rnams bzhi po thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la/ /stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te/ /rnam par phye ba rab tu mdzad/ /bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang / /
gnyis kyi pha rol dus ngan dang / /de dag du'ang ci dgos pa/ /sa la lus can rnams kyis te/ /ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad/ /stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste/ /stug po de ni dri med gnas/ /

sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi/ /ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol mtshams/ /thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas/ /dri med stug na rnal 'byor ldan/ /zla ba bzhin du 'gro la snang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shas kyis/ /

sna tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni/ /gang la gang snang gang gis kyang / /ji ltar gang la de bde ba/ /de dag de la thams cad du/ /de phyir cha yis mig la gnas/ /shes can yul can thub pa ni/ /rnal 'byor mkhyen

pa shes pas snang / /dbang po che gzugs gzhan dag dang / /'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan/ /ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste/ /thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa/ /shes byed shes la yang dag snang / /sa nad sa nan

da na la/ /sa nad gzhon nu me dag dang / /sgra gcan mi ci tum bu ru/ /ig shwa ku dang zla ba'i rigs/ /thams cad sa yi rgyal po la/ /thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste/ /sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin/ /la lar mur

'dug spyod sprul te/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong / /tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par yang / /ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing / /rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang / /zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khung dang / /

ro nye zha nye mu tig dang / /pad ma ra dang an da rnyil/ /bai dUr+ya dang shel dag dang / /a sma gar ba mu sa ra/ /tshul dang brtags pa thams cad ldan/ /mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang / /gang gis lus can su su cir/ /
sa la bde ba skye ba bzhin/ /de la de bde thams cad du/ /thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung / /lha yi bu mos mi skyod do/ /de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis/ /'dod khams dbang po'i bud med dang / /
de bzhin klu yi bud med kyis/ /mi ci lha min bu mo dang / /gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no/ /de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal/ /gzugs can rnams kyi yul de bzhin/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang / /

cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin te/ /'du shes yod min ma yin gyi/ /gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med/ /kun chu la sogs 'di dag lam/ /rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos/ /ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag kyang / /srog

chags rnams kyis yod pa/ /lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ /stug na gnas la stug na med/ /zhing de dri med bsod nams te/ /stug po snying po shin du mdzes/ /de bzhin thar pa thar shes la/ /zhing gi nang na

zhing gi mchog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste/ /stug po de ni yun du brtag /mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang / /stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin/ /yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus/ /sangs rgyas de na rnam par

mdzes/ /sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te/ /rnam thar bden pa stong pa nyid/ /mtshan med smon pa med pa dang / /pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te/ /bsgom dang sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / /shes rab rnams kyis
de sku 'thob/ /yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi/ /'dus ma byas pa sangs rgyas sku'o/ /rtog med rtog dang bral ba ste/ /bdag med yid dang dbang po rnams/ /shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing / /mtshan gyis
kun nas shin du bsags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs kyi/ /dkar po'i las rnams byas pas na/ /sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog /stug po'i ris su 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

lha rdzas gnas/ /nyi zla rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rgyu skar skar phran snang ba dang / /zla ba dus dang ltad mo med/ /rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'char dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang / /kun nas bzang po'i
stug po de/ /nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang / /dus kyi 'bri ba de na med/ /nad rnams gang yang yod pa min/ /'chi rga med pa'i gnas yin te/ /stug po de ni zhing gi mchog /thams cad gzugs ldan zhi
ba'i gnas/ /dri med mthong ba'i chos can gyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing stug bsod nams te/ /lha rnams kun kyis smon par bya/ /rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du/ /sa dang sa la gnas pa dag /sems tsam rang
bzhin dngos po rnams/ /gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na/ /yid dang sems dang kun gzhi'i tshul/ /rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te/ /chos la bdag med rang bzhin can/ /gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/ /lus ni
shin du gnas gyur pas/ /thub pa rnams ni der 'dong ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /stug po zhing rab dam par ro/ /stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum mo// //

lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can/ /'dus byas rdul phran tshogs yin te/ /yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs/ /'byung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te/ /khu chu khrag las kun 'byung ba/ /sngon med rnam par
'phel ba ste/ /steng gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med/ /las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g.yogs/ /dug gi shing gi sa bzhin du/ /dpa' dang rdul gyis de bzhin du/ /
mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste/ /lam rgyud dog par shin du 'phyan/ /dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye/ /yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni/ /phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas/ /klu dang yi dgas sha za dang / /
'bar ba lha yi nang du yang / /skye 'am lha min 'jig rten nam/ /sngags 'chang rigs su de bzhin te/ /'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su/ /bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skye ba/ /'khor lo 'khor rigs dam par

yang / /bar bar du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na/ /su yi gang gi gang tshe las/ /lhan cig skyes pa rab byung zhing / /lhan cig skyes pa'i las tshul gyis/ /lam

dang lam du rab tu 'jug /brtag med rtog dang bral ba yi/ /gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na/ /thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste/ /yi ge yi ge med byas pa'o/ /'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs/ /de ni 'od snang mchog

yin te/ /yang dag bla nas blar sbyangs pa/ /stug po'i dkyil na rnam par gnas/ /bye ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis/ /sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas/ /de ste de shes yod na ni/ /dog pa'i lam nas 'grol bar

'gyur/ /de lta'i skyes bu skyes pa ni/ /khyad par shes shes rnam par brjod/ /lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing / /mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba ni/ /byas pa yin no mi
rnams kyi/ /ma rig sred dang las skyes min/ /nyon mongs las las shin du byung / /mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing / /mtshan ma med las rab 'das te/ /yi ge med pa de byung nas/ /spros pa thams cad
rab bral zhing / /stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro/ /dmigs las sems zhig 'gyur ba ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyi sgra rmongs pas/ /rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang / /mtho ris bud med bsten rmongs kyis/ /
gang tshe thub chen ma 'dug pa/ /de tshe sems ni 'byung ba ste/ /lam las skyod ces bya ba yi/ /ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye/ /

sems can 'du shes med song na/ /ting nge 'dzin las bral bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur/ /rgyas la gang tshe thub dbang gyur/ /gnyis dang bral bas byang
ba yi/ /sems ni mngon par ni 'byung ngo / /de bden de ni rnal 'byor te/ /bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin/ /bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya/ /de ste stug dkyil 'dod na'o/ /
mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi'o// // rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems/ /ma rig 'jig rten rgyu yin te/ /'di ni sems dang sems 'byung mthu/ /gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /
de yi mthus kyang 'jug pa ni/ /rnam shes rnams dang dbang po rnams/ /ma rig la sogs rnam pa 'di/ /rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang / /'byung ba rnams dang 'byung

gnas dang / /yul dang dbang po 'jig rten dang / /skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no/ /thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi/ /'gro ba dbang por bcas

pa 'di/ /'jig rten btsal bas ma bskyed de/ /bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa/ /nang dang phyi dag rtag par te/ /'gro ba gnas dang g.yo ba dag /lha yi lha yi yul yin te/ /sa la sus kyang mi mthong ba/ /
mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste/ /thub grags mtshan ma can gyis so/ /phan tshun bcings pas bcings pa ni/ /sred pa sna tshogs rnam pas te/ /rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na/ /sems kyi rnam par mi
rtogs so/ /lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi/ /mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs pa'i thabs/ /thob nas slar du ldog pa ni/ /sa ma ya ru rigs sems pa/ /'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang / /gang yang

zla ba'i 'bras bu dang / /mer gzhug pa yi 'bras bu dang / /gang gzhan mchod sbyin 'bras bu dang / /phyugs bcing ba yi 'bras bu yang / /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ldog go/ /chos gsum can gyi 'gro ba dag /

ci nyes mi rig thor tshugs can/ /yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba/ /chu skyes bzhin du snying po med/ /'di yis thar pa mi rnyed pa/ /stug po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ /de ni rnal 'byor gyis 'thob ste/ /
stug po rnal 'byor rig pa'i gnas/ /de bas tshul gcig tshangs pa'i bdag /rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug brtson par/ /'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang / /skye zhing 'chi ba yod med de/ /mi chod gzhig tu
med pa ni/ /lus can kun gyi rnam par shes/ /bag chags kyis ni mi gos pa/ /sngon med dus nas byung bas so/ /yid kyi gnas ngan len bsags pa'i/ /spros pas kyang ngo cir mi 'jug /ji ltar lha rdzas

chu skyes dang / /nam mkha' la yang phyag dar dang / /sprin gyi dri mas nyi zla la/ /de bzhin mi gos rnal 'byor can/ /ma bshol rab tu brtson par gyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /rnal 'byor bde

gshegs lha yi rdzas/ /rnal 'byor can gyi tshul skyed pa/ /tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te/ /ye shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing / /mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang / /'khor ba las ni 'da' bar gyis/ /

'di la khams rnams gang yang med/ /phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang / /ming dang gzugs dag rgyur byas shing / /lus can rnams kyi yid kyang skye/ /ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis/ /'bar te 'bar bar rtog pa med/ /

de bzhin phung po shing rta stong / /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ri dgas sred dang dri za yi/ /gnas dang sgra tshogs snang ba ru/ /ri dgas bus pa la sogs mthong / /yang dag ma yin ltas bslad pas/ /de bzhin

yul las byung ba'i sems/ /khab long lta bur 'khor ba ste/ /gang yang 'di la dngos med pa/ /'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba yi/ /g.yo ba dro ba bsher sra bar/ /bus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog /'byung ba sems kyi
tshogs las na/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ji tsam ma zhig lus yod dang / /ji tsam du ni blo 'byung ba/ /de bar rnal 'byor ye shes la/ /ma gshol bsam gtan rab tu gyis/ /thams

cad sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /'byung ba gsum kun rab tu ltos/ /smig rgyu chu zla lta bu na/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ji bzhin dri za'i grong khyer na/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang / /de bzhin lus la phung po'i

spyod/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /ji ltar rmi lam rmi bas mthong / /de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /

'dus pa rdul gyi phung po yin/ /'di sems sems byung tshogs yin par/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun lto shig /'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams/ /phan tshun kun nas 'dus pa ste/ /gdeg pa la sogs ldan pa yin/ /ci phyir

rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos/ /ro bslab lta bur gnas pa ste/ /byed pa gang yang yod pa min/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun/ /'gro ba gnas shing g.yo ba'i rnams/ /

smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su/ /rdza la sogs pa shin du rtogs/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bu ste/ /bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin/ /chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams/ /zhig pa grugs pa snying po med/ /rnam par shes pa sgyu ma

'dra/ /de yi dngos la gnas pa med/ /rtswa shing gnas pa ji bzhin na/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /'di ni rmi lam rnam myos 'di/ /'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'drid/ /'di dag thams cad smig rgyu ste/ /de bzhin dri za'i grong

khyer ro/ /gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi/ /khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de kun blo yis rtogs bya ba/ /'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /nyes pa'i rgyu ni rtswa dang bcas/ /ye shes me yis rab bsregs na/ /

lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro/ /rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang / /'jigs med 'di ni mtshan ma med/ /mtshan ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can/ /mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde/ /mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo/ /sems
kyi spyod yul bden pa min/ /bden pa blo gros spyod yul te/ /sems ni shes rab spyod yul te/ /mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o/ /kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin/ /gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste/ /mtshan

ma ming dang yul rnams dang / /sgra la sogs pa kun brjod pa'o/ /dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni/ /lus can rnams kyi 'ching ba'i rgyu/ /'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu/ /gang 'grol gang gis 'grol ba dang / /thar dang

thar pa'i bde ba dang / /mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa dang / /bdag med pa ru shes nyid kyang / /'dod chags bcom par gyur pa na'o/ /de nas mi bdag rin chen gtsug /blo chen byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /rnal 'byor can

kun dbang la smras/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams thams cad la/ /rgyal sras khyod ni brtson pa ste/ /rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshad de/ /rnal 'byor can la nye bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor the tshom bcod

pa ste/ /dpe rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag /lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa/ /tshul ni sgra yis brjod par mdzad/ /tshigs tu brjod par cir mi bgyi/ /gnad dang zung gis rnam par

mdzod/ /mi zin pa yi rgyu rnams dang / /bgab zungs dor gyis gzhom par gyis/ /phung po'i rgyu rnams bsal bar mdzod/ /yang dag 'gyur ba med pa dang / /dge ba yis kyang mkhas pas so/ /ring po mi thogs thar

pa 'thob/ /phung po'i rgyu rnams bsregs nas su/ /chos min chos kyi tshe 'byung ste/ /'di dang gzhan du'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /shes pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol/ /sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings/ /mi shes

las dang sred pa yis/ /lus can rgya cher shin du byas/ /gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang / /rnam shes yul la mngon gyur pas/ /myur phyir khong du mi chud pa/ /spyod yul du ni sems rgyu ba'o/ /yid sngon

'gro ba chos rnams te/ /lus can kun gyi de bzhin no/ /yid 'gro yid ni gces pa dag /yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad/ /gang dang gang gi rdzas kyis su/ /mi rnams stug por 'grub pa yi/ /des ni de yi dngos 'gyur ba/ /

sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin/ /ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs/ /tshon dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes/ /rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis/ /dbang sgyur pho brang

dge ba na/ /thams cad dag na snang ba ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas/ /mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das/ /stug po mthar mchog ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang / /stug de rnal 'byor can gyi gnas/ /

de ni mtshon gyis mi chod de/ /de ni mes kyang mi tshig pa/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa/ /de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o/ /de ni chus kyang mi gsher te/ /rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo/ /de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang / /nan tan byas shes byung ba min/ /rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig

pa/ /skye can kun kyi rnam par shes/ /rgyu yis sun dbyung ma yin pa/ /'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi ste/ /dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang / /mtha' ma thug pa med par 'gyur/ /dam bcas pa yi dam bca' dang / /rgyu yi

khyad par rgyu dag ste/ /de bas de la rgal du med/ /rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min/ /rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na/ /de ni stug po sems spangs pa'o/ /rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang
stug /ma skyes sngon dang tha ma med/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs las byung / /rgyu med pa dang las skyes min/ /dbang po chen pos byas pa'ang min/ /gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las/ /yang dag 'das te
gnas pa yin/ /'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes med/ /mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas/ /stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes/ /phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste/ /rgyu can

rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral/ /gcig dang gzhan pa spangs pa'o/ /gces pa dang ni rang bzhin min/ /'dod rgyal dang yang dbang po min/ /khyu mchog gi yang phyogs ma yin/ /de bzhin rig

can gsum gyi yang / /rdul gyi rkyen las byung ma yin/ /sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med/ /ngo bo nyid kyis bskyed pa min/ /'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed do/ /ma rig las dang sred pas min/ /mi shes las kyang smos

pa min/ /khur med khur gyi yul yin te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul/ /lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen/ /sa bcu dag tu rnam par sbyangs/ /rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs yul/ /don gyi dam pa ston pa'o/ /

las ci las min gang zhes te/ /byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur/ /las dang las min bshad pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can rnams bder gyur pa/ /sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te/ /lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis/ /

phyi dang nang dang thams cad du/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas/ /sems kyis sems ni mthong yin yang / /khong du mi chud bus pa rnams/ /kha gnyis sems de lus can gyi/ /yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa/ /

bdag gi byed pa'ang de bzhin byed/ /yul lta bur yang rab tu snang / /rdza ma la sogs gzugs su gnas/ /rdza la sogs pa'ang yod pa min/ /'di yi don la thub pa dag /rnal 'byor nyam chung rnam par myos/ /rnal

'byor de yang mi rtogs pa/ /bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas/ /sems 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de/ /me long zla ba bzhin du gnas/ /ji ltar rab rib rab rib can/ /skra tshogs ltos shig ltos shig kye/ /phan tshun

dag tu ston mod kyi/ /bdag nyes dbang po zhan byung gi/ /'di na gang yang skra tshogs med/ /rgyan dang nor bu dag kyang ngo / /yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar/ /dbang po'i nyes pas mthong ba yin/ /de bzhin rtog can

dbang gis 'di/ /bdag gi blo ni rdza ltar gnas/ /tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thug par/ /rtog pa med pas rab tu 'dzin/ /gang 'di mang po snang ba dag /sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan/ /sna tshogs thams cad

bdag gi sems/ /rdza las sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan/ /nang du gyur pa'i gzugs rnams dang / /mtho ris gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang / /gang 'di phyi nang bya ba rnams/ /thams cad sems las byung ba'o/ /rgyan stug
rnal 'byor gang yin pa/ /de ni gud na yod pa min/ /rnal 'byor can gyi bsod nams kyis/ /zhugs pa 'di la bslab par gyis/ /dbang sgyur lha rdzas gnas dag dang / /yang na gzugs can rnams gnas dang / /'du

shes med pa'i gnas su 'am/ /'og ma yin pa'i gnas su yang / /cung zad med dang rnam shes dang / /'du shes yod pa ma yin dang / /sna tshogs kyi ni gnas dag tu/ /'dod chags kyi ni phyogs bshig na/ /khyod ni myur

du der gnas pa/ /stug po rnal 'byor can gnas su/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas te/ /stug po der ni 'gro bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor de la spyad par gyis/ /bdag gi gnyen gyis ci zhig bya/ /bdag gi gnyen ni rtag tu

'ching / /'khor ba'i lam rgyud rgyu yang yin/ /dbang po rnams ni g.yo ba ste/ /bud med rnams la'ang blo 'khrul pas/ /khu chu khrag mnam mi zhim pa'i/ /'ji bar srin bu skyes gyur pa/ /dgu 'am bcu zhig pa dang yang /

khu chu smin nas mngon par skye/ /dbang po rnams kyis kun yog pa/ /srin bu g.yo ba ji bzhin te/ /rim pa de yi tshul gyis na/ /ji srid sems can gnas bar du'o/ /lus can rnams kyi skye la ltos/ /tshe tsher de dag

byung ba ste/ /pha dang ma ni stong dag dang / /bu dang chung ma brgya dag kyang / /thams cad gnas su rnyed pa ni/ /lus can skye la gnas pa'o/ /rmi lam dag na bu med pa'i/ /mo sham bu 'byung ji bzhin du/ /bu rnyed pa yi

dga' ba dang / /rmi lam rmi tshe de nyid ldan/ /de ni shir gyur de nas de/ /rmi lam shes nas sad pa dang / /rmi lam gyi ni bu shi med/ /gang yang skye ba yod pa min/ /chu bo rab tshal bu dang ni/ /grong khyer dag dang ri

rnams dang / /grong dang tshong 'dus phyugs lhas dang / /dka' thub tshal bu'i gnas rnams dang / /'gro ba dag gis rgyas pa'i yul/ /zhing dang ba lang lug gis gang / /'jig rten gyi ni longs spyod kyang / /

de dang 'di dang gzhan du'ang snang / /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir rgyug pa/ /rmi lam rgyug pa de bzhin te/ /gdeg dang bskum la sogs pa yang / /de dang 'dir yang snang ba yin/ /mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba/ /
skye ba med cing 'chi med par/ /slar sad nas su sems pa ni/ /bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no/ /ji ltar ri dang de'u rnams kyi/ /grib ma kun du snang ba bzhin/ /de ltar 'jig rten rmi lam yang / /mkhas pa

rnams ni de bzhin bsam/ /ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba zhig /bud med lhan cig rtse dga' rmi/ /sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang / /lha rab btsun mo mnyam pa dang / /gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos pos te/ /sad nas
rnam par sem pa ni/ /ci zhig bden nam rmi lam yin/ /rmi lam bud med lhan cig tu/ /rtses nas phyir ni bdag sad de/ /'di brdzun bus pa slu ba yin/ /de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun/ /rgyal srid stobs

kyang de bzhin no/ /dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang / /ma dang phu nu po dag kyang / /rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste/ /rnal 'byor sbyar bar jir mi bya/ /dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang / /ri dang ri yi sman gshong dang / /'o ma 'byung

dang ma la ya/ /lhun po byin dang dbang chen dang / /gangs kyi ri dang ke'i la sa/ /char 'bab la yang gang gnas dang / /'dzam bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang / /gang dag bdud rtsi za ba dang / /phan du kam bal par ya

tra/ /ko bi dar na gang 'khod dang / /ri rab nang na gang gnas dang / /dpag bsam shing la gnas pa dang / /rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /thams can kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di/ /gang

'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste/ /pad mo'i gnas su brten bcas te/ /skyil mo krung du mnyam bzhag cing / /rtag tu rnal 'byor sbyang bar gyis/ /'dod dang bde las rnam par dben/ /dbang po dbang po'i don gyi rnams/ /thams
cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing / /lcags kyus glang po ji bzhin du/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par gyis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge/ /'dod dang dga' ba dben
la sogs/ /yang na thams cad bsgrags pa dang / /khyad par du yang gzugs med dang / /'du shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang / /'du shes yod min med min rnams/ /

nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs/ /pad mo dang ni 'od 'dra zhing / /nam mkha' ri mo me 'dra bar/ /rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong / /'di dag thams cad spangs nas su/ /snang ba med par rab tu gnas/ /gang tshe mtshan med

rnal 'byor can/ /rnam par mi rtog chags med na/ /sangs rgyas bye ba rnams kyang mthong / /zhing dang zhing na mnyam bzhag pa/ /de dag phyag gis dbang bskur bar/ /de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas sa la

zhugs pa dang / /sna tshogs gzugs ni rab tu 'byung / /sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas/ /kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /stobs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'thob/ /gzungs dang thams cad ting nge 'dzin/ /

thams cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /thub pa rnal 'byor skyed pa'i yang / /gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzhigs shing / /mchog rdul yan chad nyin dben phyir/ /yod las med par 'gyur ba ste/ /bong bu'i ba lang rwa mthong

bzhin/ /cha shes med phyir cha shas can/ /phung po las ni phung can med/ /de bas las kyi 'bras gyur pa/ /'di ni sgyu ma'i bus byas bzhin/ /'di na las med 'bras bu med/ /las kyi sgrub pa'ang yod pa min/ /

'jig rten byed pas ma byas te/ /byed pa byed pa ma yin no/ /byed la byed pa yod na ni/ /'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur/ /thug med byas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /thub pa dri ma can du gyur/ /de ste lam rgyud sna tshogs rnams/ /

chu dang nam mkha' sa gnas pa'i/ /lus can lus la kun gnas te/ /skye ba bzang po gnas su ste/ /ris su 'gro ba yod pas na/ /ji ltar 'dod par lus can 'gro/ /dbang po so so bya ba yang / /ji ltar 'dod par

yul 'dzin te/ /'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba/ /zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las/ /de bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig /las kyis byas par 'gyur sems na/ /rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin/ /brag cha dang ni glog 'dra ba/ /
smig rgyu ri dgas sred pa ltar/ /dngos po rnam bsgoms rnal 'byor can/ /thog ma med nas bsags pa yi/ /mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis/ /sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang / /sna tshogs rtog pas las

su brtags/ /dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin/ /yul rnams rmi lam 'dra ba ste/ /byed dang las dang bya ba yang / /rnal 'byor sgrub pas mi brtag go/ /rtog pa nyams pa'i rtog pa can/ /rnam myos shes pa nyam chung bas/ /

byed par rab tu rtog pa ni/ /bya bas 'gro bar byas par te/ /'jig rten gces pas byas ma yin/ /rdul gyi rkyen las byung ba'ang min/ /rgyu med pas kyang byas ma yin/ /ngo bo nyid kyis byung ba'ang min/ /rdo rje

lcags dang khab long dang / /rin chen phreng ba rgyan rnams kyis/ /ji lta bu yi las shig byas/ /nor bu gser du ming btags pas/ /bya dang ri dgas khra bo dang / /tsher ma rnams kyi rno dngos dang / /'gro ba sna

tshogs ngo mtshar ba/ /rnam rtog las las ma skyes so/ /las ci gang las ma yin zhes/ /rtog can bden la myos pa ni/ /bden pa'i dngos por mi shes pa/ /'di ni rnam rtog las min du/ /'o ma'i nang na yod pa'i dus
rjes su mi bde rnam par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa'ang thams cad du/ /de bzhin dngos po rnams la 'jug /dngos po skye ba ma yin te/ /dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'ang med/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs de dag ni/ /
rtog pa can gyis mi rig go/ /'gro ba'i ris kyi dngos po dag /rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhig /sbyar zhing rnal 'byor de la zhugs/ /las dang las min ma sems par/ /ris su 'gro ba'i dngos po yis/ /

zla ba nyi ma rnam mdzes pa/ /rlung gis shin du bskyod nas kyang / /mkha' la rten pa med par 'gro/ /shin du phra zhing shes dka'i las/ /stug por gnas par rab tu mthong / /las de ci zhig yod par 'gyur/ /

zhugs brtson rnal 'byor can dag la/ /ji ltar me ni shing gi ri/ /thal bar byed pa skad cig tu/ /rnal 'byor can gyi thams cad las/ /ye shes mes tshig skad cig du/ /las dang bag chags lhan cig du/ /mang
po'i dus nas bsags pa dag /rnal 'byor ye shes bag chags kyis/ /thams cad zhig byed skad cig du/ /ji ltar sgron mas mun pa'i tshogs/ /skad cig tu ni bsal byed pa/ /ye shes sgron mas thub pa de/ /

mi shes rnam par sel bar bya/ /rgyan stug po theg pa chen po'i mdo las bdag gi las kyi bya ba spyad pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u lnga pa'o// // 'phags pa rgyan stug po/ bam po gsum pa/ 'jim pa rtswa mig thag

pa las/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i khyim gyi rnams/ /phan tshun kun nas 'dus 'byor cing / /sa yi dbus na snang ba ni/ /re re la yang khyim med de/ /rdzas dang dngos la rnam brtags na/ /rdzas kyi rnam pa 'dus pa la/

khyim zhes bdags shing brjod pa ste/ /sor mo phan tshun kun 'dus na/ /ji ltar lag pa'i phu dung du/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsdus las 'gyur/ /tha dad pa las mi 'byung ngo / /g.yul dang shing rta bsnyems bral khang /

grong khyer nags tshal de bzhin te/ /ri dang sprin dang dba' rlabs kyang / /brag cha glog dang 'dra ba'o/ /smig sgyu chu zla sgyu 'dra ba/ /snam bu rdza sogs grags pa ste/ /mkhas la dngos po thams cad kyang / /rmi lam 'dra bar

kun du snang / /de bzhin lus khyim sna tshogs pa/ /bus pa'i lam rgyud dog pa na/ /khams kyis ri bzhin gyur pa ste/ /khyim ltar rtag tu mi brtan la/ /'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las

min/ /rtag dang chad las rnam par grol/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa yongs su spangs/ /ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer ni/ /mdog tu zad kyang grong ltar snang / /de bzhin rang rtog rnam brtags pa'i/ /dngos po rnams kyang rab tu 'byung / /

chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /yod med rnam bral dge ba yin/ /rmi lam sprin ltar snang ba ste/ /rtsig ngos ri mo'i phug lta bu'o/ /zha bo long ba 'dra ba ni/ /dngos kun gcig gis gcig rgyu ba/ /rang bzhin rtogs

par mi rung ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyis yang dag mthong / /rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang / /rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te/ /rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas/ /rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod/ /de phyir blo ni
phyir ldog ste/ /sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan spangs/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /de tshe ngal bso'i yid du 'gyur/ /ngal bso'i yid ldan rnal 'byor can/ /bcings pa kun las grol bas na/ /

'di dang pha bir mi skye ste/ /bsam gtan tshul la mos pa rnams/ /sna tshogs rin chen snying po yi/ /gnas na dbang can de dag rtse/ /yon tan dbang byung nyes pa med/ /rig 'dzin bud med mang po dang / /

thub pa rnams kyis rab mchod cing / /rmi lam bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /'di na gnas kyang tshangs pa dang / /thub dang thub pa'i bu rnams dang / /rig 'dzin tshogs kyis de bzhin te/ /spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus so/ /

'di ni thub pa'i rnal 'byor yul/ /de bas bsam gtan brtson par gyis/ /'di ni kun gyi yul ma yin/ /de phyir grogs po bstan par gyis/ /brtan pa sa rnams sna tshogs dang / /'od can rnams kyi gnas su yang /

'dod chags phyogs dang bcas pa dang / /gti mug zhe sdang de bzhin du/ /bcom ste stug po rab yangs pa/ /yid bzhin zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro/ /de ni 'chi bdag yul ma yin/ /rnam shes spyod yul de bzhin min/ /

mtshan ma med pa'i gnas yin te/ /rtog pas de bsgrub ma yin no/ /'di ni lha rdzas gnas yin te/ /thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /de bas zhing mchog de 'dod na/ /thub pas bsam gtan de la gyis/ /'dod chags zhe

sdang rnam bcom ste/ /nga med nga yi 'gro med du/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mi bsam par/ /bsam gtan mchog la bsgom par gyis/ /phan tshun yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /gnyis kyi blo ni rab tu 'byung / /yod med rtog

pas de bzhin du/ /rnam shes rnams la kun gzhi'o/ /bud med ro smad shas rgyas shing / /skra bzang mig kyang mdzes pa dang / /sna lags 'phral ba'i dbyibs sdug la/ /smin ma stug cing blta mdzes pa/ /ji ltar

la la der chags pa'i/ /yid kyis rnam par myos pa'i sems/ /lta zhing rnam par rtog pa'i tshe/ /mkhas min de la shin du myos/ /'gro 'dug 'greng yang de bzhin te/ /snom za gnyid kyis log pa na'ang / /'dod can

gzhan du mi sems te/ /'dod pa can mo yid la byed/ /de bzhin khyod blo rnyog pa can/ /rnam pa kun du yid la gnas/ /rdzab yul rnyog dang ldan pa yi/ /bcings pa'i dbang du ma 'gro shig /ji ltar la la rtog pa can/ /

blo yi spyod yul rnam 'khrul ba/ /ma he dag dang bal glang dang / /glang po dag dang bse rnams dang / /rang ga kri sna sa ra dang / /sha ra ba dang su ra dang / /smyan dang g.yag kyang de bzhin te/ /mgo dkar rna dang khyu mchog gi/ /

ru chen rnam par mthong ba dang / /'di bden gzhan du mi 'gyur zhes/ /seng stag bong bu sogs pa yi/ /rwa rnams la ni med ces te/ /yod dang med pa'i lta ba yang / /mi mkhas rnams la rab tu 'byung / /de ltar gzhan

gyi rwa mthong zhing / /bong bu'i med ces rnam rtog 'byung / /ji ste gzhan gyis ma mthong na/ /bong ru med snyam de mi 'byung / /log par dmigs pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ /'di na med ces rtog pa 'byung / /de la dmigs pa med pas kyang / /

gdon mi za bar med la rten/ /rnyog can nga rgyal rtog yul la/ /blo gros spyod yul ma rton cig /ba lang ba men ma he rnams/ /rtog pas brtags pa ji bzhin te/ /de ltar khyod kyis sems spyod dang / /phung po skye mched

spyod yul dag /mngon sum tshad ma dag gis sam/ /shes rab kyis kyang rnam par ltos/ /rnam grol mtho ris 'gro ba 'am/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su tshangs par ram/ /mtshe ma rab

dang gnas dben dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gnas su yang / /dbang sgyur rnam par mdzes par 'gyur/ /'od cung rgyas pa dag tu 'am/ /'dod khams bdag po dbang can nam/ /nyi zla bdag bdag gnas su 'am/ /gzhan

yang 'od 'bar gzar yang rung / /sum bcu rtsa gsum rgyal chen dang / /'phrul la dga' ba'i gnas su yang / /tshangs gnas bcu dang ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can ni rnam par mdzes/ /gya nom snang dang shin du mthong / /

'dod med mi dos de bzhin te/ /'og min gnas kyi lha rdzas na/ /'og min shin du rnam par mdzes/ /cung zad med mkha' rnam shes dang / /'du shes yod med ma yin dang / /de bzhin 'phrul gyi bde can dang / /zhing

bzang gzhan du de bzhin te/ /mkha' la 'gro dang spobs pa bzhin/ /'khor lo 'khor ba'i rigs su gnas/ /grol ba rnams kyi grol yul la/ /su gnas de dag rnal 'byor can/ /'dod chags stobs las sngon rgyal ba/ /

de dag bzang po'i sa la gnas/ /'di lta'i rnal 'byor ldan pas na/ /rnal 'byor la ni thub par rtse/ /rdza ma 'jig pa'i gyo mo yi/ /ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur ba dang / /skad cig 'jig la skad cig ste/ /mi rtag nyid kyang rtag pa yi/ /

sa bon ji bzhin myu gu la/ /rgyu rnams de dag 'dra ba yin/ /myu gu gzhan min sa bon las/ /sa bon nyid kyang myu gu min/ /sa snar rnams las rdza snar 'byung / /tshos dam dmar rur mngon par 'byung / /gnag dang snar dang 'dres

pa dang / /gro bo dmar po dag kyang ste/ /'dam bu las ni sgog par 'gyur/ /rwa las lan tshwar de bzhin te/ /mi gtsang sbrang bu dag las kyang / /srin bur 'gyur gzhan mi 'dra mang / /rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /sa rnams

gang na'ang yod pa min/ /gyur pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung / /rdul phran gang dag rgyur 'gyur ni/ /dngos po 'jig pa med par te/ /rnam par rtog la mi rtog cing / /rgyu yi bdag dang nang gi bdag /bdag gi mchog kyang

med pa ste/ /bdag dang dbang po yid dang don/ /'dus pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te/ /phrad las 'byung dang rnam shes dang / /rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin no/ /shes can shes pas yul rnams la/ /mkhas pa'i stobs dang
ldan pas ni/ /sde dpung stobs dang bzhon bcas pa'i/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams gdul bar bya/ /sred pa 'jig rten dma' bar byed/ /sbrang rtsis bad kan mang po bzhin/ /sred pa bcom zhing thub pa'i rnams/ /

rnam pa mang las rnam par grol/ /sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa na/ /'khor las rnam par mi 'grol te/ /sred dang rnam bral 'thar bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis/ /yun ring yod pa'i bag chags ni/ /

sbrul gdug khros pa ji bzhin yang / /'di dang pha bir 'drid pa ni/ /'khor ba'i lam rgyud dog par ro/ /'phags pa rgyan stug po las rnal 'byor rnam par phye ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go/ //

sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnam phye dang / /bdag ldan de yi byin gyis brlabs/ /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /bye ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa dang / /khams gsum gnas pa thams cad dang / /sa gnas rnal 'byor ldan pa dang / /

bde yod zhing dang stug po ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyi zhing mchog dang / /sangs rgyas pad mo'i dbus bzhugs pa/ /rdul phran bzhin bzhugs bdag gis mthong / /rnal 'byor de las bdag langs nas/ /sa la rgyal ba de dag ni/ /

stug po'i zhing na bdag bzhugs shing / /rgyal sras thabs cig bzhugs pa dag /me tog a ta si 'dra ba'i/ /mkha' la zla 'dra bzhin bzhugs mthong / /mthe bo'i tshigs dang rab 'dra ba/ /sa rnams dge la rab sbyor ba'i/ /

rnam grol snying po bdag gis mthong / /'di na bu khyod su zhig ces/ /snying po de ltar sems gyur te/ /thub pa 'di ni gcig cig snyam/ /de tshe sku ru zhugs par gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyang skur zhugs nas/ /thub pa pad mo'i

snying po yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs spyod dang / /khams gsum kun na gnas par yang / /gang tshe mthong ba de dus na/ /kye ma mtshar ces bsam pa dang / /de tshe thub pa lha yi lhas/ /rnal 'byor yul ni rab
bsdus te/ /thub pas sngon bzhin bzhag par gyur/ /kye ma bsam yas lha rdzas 'di/ /rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs gzugs/ /sangs rgyas lha yi yul yin te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis mthong / /chos kyi
sprin gyi ting 'dzin dang / /dga' dang mi g.yo de bzhin te/ /ring song mngon du gyur pa dang / /'od byed pa yi ma lus par/ /sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs/ /gzi brjid can yang ma lus par/ /gzugs

rnams kyi yang yul yin te/ /'og min thabs las byung ba'o/ /de ni yid bzhin 'gyur sku yis/ /dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams/ /phra tshogs che ba'i yon tan dang / /'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang / /

bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang / /ji ltar 'dod par rung ba'i rnams/ /thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na/ /rnam par gnas shing rab tu rtse/ /sprul pa'i lha rdzas stug po nas/ /phyin pa dge ba de dag kyang / /lhun gyis

grub pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /'phrul pa rnams ni rab tu 'gyed/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras su/ /thabs gcig bzhugs par kun na snang / /de ltar sa 'di sna tshogs te/ /rang gi gzugs ldan rnams kyang 'dres/ /cha las

phyir ldog de yi tshe/ /bya ba byas pas stug po'i gzhi/ /shes pas bcad cing mkhas pa'i rnams/ /thub pa dag gis stug po mthong / /gzhal med pad mo 'dra ba na/ /me ltar rab tu 'bar ba yin/ /thub pa rnal 'byor bde

mos pa/ /rnal 'byor can dang lhan cig gnas/ /dpal be'u mtshan dang thams cad ldan/ /phra ba'i lus can rang gi 'od/ /de dag dbus su thub pa'i dbang / /khyod ni gnas par rab tu 'gyur/ /ltos shig lha yi cod pan dang / /

dru ma mi 'am ci yi bdag /gzhal med bye ba mang po yis/ /zla ba bzhin du rab tu 'bar/ /thub pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /dga' ldan la sogs lha yi mchog /a ta sa yi me tog 'dra/ /shes rab bzung zhing mtshan

mang ba/ /phreng ba cod pan thogs pa'i rnams/ /gzhal med mang pos gnas pa ste/ /lus ni rab tu 'bar ba dang / /kun mkhyen thams cad mngon gyur pa/ /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / /kun du bzang po stobs chen te/ /

zla ba 'dra ba'i gzhal med kyis/ /stug po'i gang chen mtsho la gnas/ /rnam pa du mar thams cad nas/ /thub pa rnams kyis bstod pa ste/ /chags med tshangs pa'i khyu mchog dang / /grub dang dri za tshogs rnams dang / /

mkhas dang nges par ldan pa yi/ /skyes bu'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas khyad par du/ /gzims pa lta bur mthong ba ni/ /de dag le lo bral bas te/ /gnyid dang snyom

sogs bsrabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas lha yi rjes su 'brang / /mur 'dug kun gyis mthong gyur cing / /de bzhin lha dang tshangs la sogs/ /'dzam gling pa dang 'og min dang / /'phrul gyis sprul pas thub mthong ba/ /'gro

bas sna tshogs kun gzugs su/ /sa la kun nas zhugs par te/ /cho 'phrul rnam pa mang po yis/ /mgon po shin du rnam par mdzes/ /la la nyal zhing rab tu 'bar/ /de bzhin gzhan dag phan tshun 'chag /la la g.yen

spyo brel cing sgom/ /de bzhin gzhan yang mya ngan 'da'/ /la la mngal du 'jug pa dang / /skye dang 'byung dang dka' spyod dang / /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ro/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas
yul/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /rgyal ba'i sras po 'jigs med pa/ /de dag kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te/ /thub pa shAkya'i seng ge yis/ /ji ltar brnyes bzhin grogs po rnams/ /rgyal sras 'jigs pa med

pa yis/ /'di dag kun la yid ches kyis/ /yid ches gyur na sangs rgyas sam/ /thar bar 'gyur ba the tsom med/ /'khor lo 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /spobs can khams kyi bdag po dang / /tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas

su yang / /gnas 'gyur 'khor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /dri med zhing gi pad mo la/ /thub pa'i dbus su skye bar 'gyur/ /pad mo'i dbus su skye ba yang / /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i sras kyis 'thob/ /brtson pas bdud las
rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bags chags 'dod pa'i rgyu las kyang / /'dod bdag bdag po pham byas shing / /theg pa gcig la rab tu 'jug /brtson 'grus ldan zhing zhi med pa'i/ /rigs kyang thub pa rab tu ston/ /

sras po yangs pa'i rigs gyur cing / /zhing dang zhing du bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid du smon sems na/ /sangs rgyas rigs ni rnam par dag /rnam dag rigs ni rnam par dag /rnam dag rigs can sras de ni/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te/ /myur du sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin thub pa 'tshang rgya'o/ /rnam sangs rgyas nas nyer 'tsho ba/ /tshangs la sogs dang rnal 'byor can/ /sa ltar rtag pa'i dus su yang / /lus can

rnams la nye bar gnas/ /thams cad sman gyi rnal 'byor can/ /ji ltar grong dang grong gnas pa/ /nad rnams rab tu sel ba ltar/ /rab tu mkhas pa de byed pa/ /rnam rtog med pa'i yid kyis te/ /bcad kyang g.yo zhing 'gul

ba med/ /'di ni rnam par rig pa tsam/ /yid ni nang dang phyir yang spyod/ /bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste/ /nor bar mthong zhing mi g.yo'o/ /yid kyi rnam shes yul can gyi/ /kun gzhi kun nas gnas pa ste/ /gcad dang gcod par

byed pa dang / /de nyid gcad bya gcod pa'ang yin/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi ni/ /las kyi bag chags rnams kyis yog /khar ba nor bu nyi ma dag /ldan las me 'byung ji bzhin te/ /gtsub ma gtsub stan 'dus las

min/ /mis kyang byas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin sems yid rnam shes dang / /dbang po don dang yid dang las/ /sems rnams rab tu skyer gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ci bzhin no/ /smig rgyu nam mkha' sgyu ma dang / /

rmi lam ma yin nor ba'ang min/ /sbal pa ru sbal spu dag dang / /ri bong rwa dang mnyam pa'ang min/ /me ni shing las skye bar 'gyur/ /glog ni de bzhin sprin las so/ /med la skyed pa su 'ang med/ /rdza sogs rdza mkhan lta bu'o/ /

ji ltar rtswa dang shing dag la/ /brten cing lhan cig sgyu 'byung ba/ /de bzhin mos la sogs pa kun/ /sems dang sems byung lhan cig gnas/ /sems kyi yul ni bsam du med/ /stug na gnas pas legs par mthong /

lha rdzas sngon med lhan cig skyes/ /mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' bzhin/ /so sor ma brtags 'gog pa ltar/ /dus gsum rnam par spangs pa ste/ /'od can rtag tu dag pa ni/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi'o/ /dang po tshes pa'i

zla mdog ltar/ /bye ba'i zhing du snang ba ste/ /ri rab gnas shing 'khor ba yang / /dngos po 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin yid sems rnam par shes/ /sems can khams na 'khor mod kyi/ /de la 'phel zhing 'bri med de/ /

rtag tu rang bzhin 'od snang ba'o/ /ji ltar zla ba skye 'bri bar/ /mi shes 'gro ba rnam rtog kyang / /skye 'bri zla la yod pa min/ /gling dang gling du'ang rab tu snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes la/ /byis pa mi shes 'gro rnams

kyang / /rtag tu skye brir rnam rtog ste/ /de ni zag med sangs rgyas so/ /kun gzhi 'di la ji ltar yang / /'byung bas tha dad mi 'gyur te/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes song gnas pa/ /bag chags kyis ni zla ba bzhin/ /

chu klung dbus kyi shing lta bur/ /chu bo'i klung dang 'grogs mod kyi/ /tha dad mtshan du'ang rab tu grub/ /rgya mtsho chen por de bzhin 'gro/ /de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rtag tu bag chags ldan 'gyur ba/ /

rnam par shes pa bdun po dang / /'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dang / /rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yang de/ /chos mthong 'phags pa rnams kyi yang / /de ni rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag pa/ /byol song

mi dang lhar skyes dang / /sha za lto 'phye yi dgas dang / /lha min dri za 'bar ba yi/ /lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang / /sangs rgyas kun kyi gzhi mdzes la'ang / /de nyid rgyur ni gyur pa ste/ /de rtogs nas ni sangs rgyas dang / /
rigs dang theg pa gzhan min 'gyur/ /thams cad lus la rtag tu gnas/ /spyod 'os yod la rnam par 'dug /dpal dang ldan la khyad par du/ /thams cad kun kyang rab tu gnas/ /rab

dang 'bring dang tha ma la'ang / /'gro ba dog pa thams cad na/ /de ni kun du gnas pa ste/ /lus can rnams kyi lus la rten/ /'bras bu'i bdag dang rgyu yi bdag /nang gi bdag kyang de nyid la/ /byis pa rnams kyis khor zug

brtag /de yi dbyings la thog ma med/ /gnas ngan len dang las kyis bskyed/ /bag chags thog ma med pas bsags/ /'tsho zhing gso bar byed pa ni/ /rnam par shes pa bdun po ste/ /yid ni rtag tu rlung dang mnyam/ /

g.yo zhing myur bar rab tu 'jug /lus can rnams kyi lus gnas shing / /khams kyi gong la gnas pa'o/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyed pa ni/ /dbang po rnams la khyab par gnas/ /rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu/ /

dba' rlabs bzhin du rgyu ba ste/ /rdul phran dus dang gtso bo dang / /de bzhin skyes bu dbang bcas su/ /kun gzhi gcig pu dge ba de/ /rtog pa can gyis ther zug brtag /rtag tu sna tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs/ /g.yo zhing

myur 'byung byed pa ste/ /kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad du/ /phyi nang bcas par gnas pa yin/ /de ni sa yi rgyu yin par/ /rgyu can rnams kyis brtag pa ste/ /de yi 'gro ba shin du phra/ /rtog pa can rnams myos par byed/ /

bdag don dbang po yid mos pa'i/ /yang dag ma mthong myos par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyis bskyod pa yi/ /rnam par shes pa sred pa'i rgyu/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba dang / /mi rnams kyi yang rgyu yin no/ /

'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /rdo rje'i snying pos yang smras pa/ /kun gzhi dang lugs dge ba ni/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong thos te/ /kun gzhi'i mchog tu dge ba ni/ /thams cad lus la zhen pa ste/ /sum bcu rtsa

gnyis mtshan ldan zhing / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba 'khor lo 'khor bar yang / /sa rnams la lar 'gro bas mthong / /ji ltar zla ba skar tshogs dang / /lhan cig mkha' la gnas pa ltar/ /

rnam shes rnams dang kun gzhi yang / /de bzhin lhan cig lus la gnas/ /ji ltar dbang gis sgyur ba'i lha/ /lha yi bu mos mdun bdar cing / /rin chen dbus na rnam mdzes pa/ /de bzhin kun gzhi sa rnams la/ /

ji ltar chu dbang chu yi lha/ /chu klung rgya mtsho mching rnams la/ /ji bzhin skye ldan sa yang ste/ /de bzhin sems ni rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar gzhal med gnas pa'i gnyi/ /ri rab logs na rnam par mdzes/ /lha rnams kyis

ni phyag kyang bya/ /de bzhin kun gzhi sangs rgyas sar/ /sa bcu dag la lhan cig tu/ /spyad pa spyod pa rgyal ba'i sras/ /theg pa chen pos phyung ba ste/ /lus la gnas pa rnam par mdzes/ /rjod pa'i zhal gyis rtag par

yang / /rgyal ba rnams ni kun nas bstod/ /nyan thos rnams dang rang rgyal dang / /rgyal ba'i sras rnams khyad par du/ /sa dang sa la rnam dag pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras shes mngon bsgrags dang / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i

sras/ /de dag kun gzhi 'di la brjod/ /lung ston lung bstan 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba de bzhin te/ /kun gzhi dri med bsod nams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di lta bu yi kun gzhi'i

yul/ /stug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /thub brtson rnal 'byor spyod pa yis/ /rab tu mthong gis rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas dag dang rang sangs rgyas/ /nyan thos rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan/ /de nyid rtogs

nas mthong ba ni/ /rnal 'byor 'jigs med rnal 'byor ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul gang / /'di ltar snang ba ci 'ang rung / /rnam par shes par gyur pa ste/ /rdza la sogs pa sa ma yin/ /'di ltar nor pa gang snang ba/ /

sna tshogs rdza grags ci 'ang rung / /de ni kun gzhi gyur pa ste/ /snang ba nor pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /kun gzhi chu klung de bzhin du/ /sna tshogs snang mngon 'gro bas mthong / /bag chags rnams kyis bsgos pa'i sems/ /

gzung dang 'dzin pa rab tu 'khor/ /dngos po sgyu 'dra ma yin te/ /skra yi tshogs dang smig rgyu min/ /skyes dang ma skyes ma yin te/ /stong dang mi stong rnam par spangs/ /dngos su gcig med mi 'gyur te/ /ring dang thung la sogs pa

bzhin/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni/ /gang na ci 'ang yod pa min/ /de ni rig sngags sgyu ma ste/ /skyes bu rnams la rab tu snang / /smig rgyu sgra la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /gnyis las nye bar mngon pa ste/ /gcig med par

ni gnyis po yang / /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /sgyu la sogs pa rnam brtags pa/ /'di ni rnam shes gyur pa'o/ /sgyu med sgyu zhes bya ba yi/ /dngos po gang dang gang yang med/ /ci 'ang rung ste gang yod pa/ /sgyu mas

byas pa'ang yod pa yin/ /myos par byed pa 'jig rten na/ /sems la dbang med rnams la yod/ /sgyu ma dag gam gyo mo dag /sna tshogs sgyu mas ma byas te/ /g.yo ba gang dag ci 'ang rung / /de ni snang min sus mi mthong / /

'di la rnam rtog g.yo ba ni/ /khab len dag la lcags bzhin te/ /sems can med la mi rtog pa'i/ /shel sgong nor bu ji bzhin no/ /kun gzhi kun nas sna tshogs pa/ /byed pa bzhin du snang ba ste/ /skya zhing 'chi bar 'gyur mod

kyi/ /'khor ba po ni gang yang med/ /rmi lam 'dra bar skye shi dag /rab tu mthong na rnam par 'grol/ /thub pa gang tshe gyur pa na/ /grol ba zhes ni brjod pa ste/ /rigs dang gzhung gis brtan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas khyu mchog

de yin no/ /thams cad chos la me long bzhin/ /srang yin de bzhin tshad ma ste/ /dngos po kun la sgron ma bzhin/ /khab blang ba yi rdo ltar gnas/ /rnal 'byor lam gyi mtshan nyid de/ /'jig pa rnams kyang rnam par bzlog /

bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mchog / rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /kun nas nyon mongs zad par byed/ /lam yang rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /dam pa'i don gyi spyod yul te/ /'gyur ba rab tu ston pa'o/ /'phags pa rgyan

stug po las le'u bdun no// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te/ gtsug gi rin po che'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dbang byed kyi

gnas dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i pho brang na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i sras rnams la'ang snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa ston pa la smras pa/ yang dag pa ji lta

ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa kha ba yod pa'i ngos la ri dgas thams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dgas kyi rigs shig yod de/ de ni gcam sgyu brgya stong gis ri dgas mang po nye bar brid cing thabs la bab pa'i ri dgas rnams bsad cing za'o/ /

ri dgas drus ma phru gu dang bcas pa mthong na'ang phru gu'i skad du 'bod do/ /ri dgas rwa can mthong na'ang rwa de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o/ /de nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang / des de dag bag rton par rig nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o/ /

rwa mthong na'ang rwa'i gzugs su bstan te/ de dag bag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsad cing za ste/ ji ltar ri dgas zhes gtum pa'i ngang tshul can de rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dgas gsod pa de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'ang phas kyi

rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par zhen pa/ bdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa/ 'dzin pa de dang de dag gis bcings pa de dang de dag la de lta de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis bdag tu smra ba yongs su rtog cing rdul phra mo yan chad du rab du shes par byed pa de dag la de'i

bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid du gnas pa ni gzhan du rnam par shes pa tsam du mi gnas pa'i bar du ste/ bdag yongs su rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis ni yid dang dbang po dang don du ldan pa las shes pa skye ba mthong gi/ bdag dang yid dang /

dbang po dang / don 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no/ /dper na me tog dang gos su phrad na gsung gi khyad par du 'gyur gyi/ ma phrad par ni bsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems dang / sems las

byung ba dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa snod dang bdar lta bu'am/ me mar dang rdza lta bu'am/ smig lo dang i shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de/ rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang

sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung zhing bdag med la phra ba dang / bskyed du mi rung ba dang / cha med pa dang / dag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang / yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis

rig pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs par rtogs par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so/ /'di nyid ni ri dgas kyi gcan zan zhe gtum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang / med pa dang / gcig pa dang / mang po dang / thams

cad dang / thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste/ lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par zhen par yang ltung bar byed do/ /mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud pa'i

blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pha bi nas rab tu rgyug ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba/ rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo can/

'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob par mi nus pa/ theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par phyir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas/ stug po'i dkyil

'khor gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po'am stug po'i sgra yang mi thos so/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa 'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs su sbyang ba ste/ 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis

kyang brtson par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams la ston cig /rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad do// // khab long rdo la ji ltar lcags/ /

yongs kyis kun du rab 'khor ba/ /de bzhin phung po'i shing rta ste/ /stong zhing bags chag byung ba 'khor/ /rtswa dang 'jim pa shing smig dang / /thag pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las/ /khyim du ji ltar snang gyur pa/ /
de bzhin phung po'i gzugs 'di'o/ /lcags dang khab long ro langs la/ /sems can nye bar dmigs med kyang / /thams cad sems can lta bur g.yo/ /de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o/ /rgyal sras phyag na
rin chen gyis/ /gzugs mang rgyal mchog la smras pa/ /mnyam bzhag rdo rje'i snying po la/ /rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byos/ /rgyal sras 'jigs med mkhas pa'i rnams/ /kun gyis thos par 'gyur ba ni/ /
brtag bral brtag par mi nus pa/ /brjod pas rnam par spangs pa ste/ /ming dang ming can rnam bral ba/ /'on kyang 'du ba de bzhin te/ /sna tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi/ /rang bzhin ci dang cir gnas pa/ /
de nas gzugs mang rgyal po yis/ /rdo rje snying po 'jigs med la/ /rjes su 'brel ba'i skabs dris pa/ /dngos po don gzhan brtag pa ste/ /rdo rje'i dbang po'i dngos po gang / /la la rab tu brtag bya

ba/ /ming dang 'du shes sogs pa'i yul/ /yod dam rdo rje snying pos smros/ /ming rnams sus byas ji lta bu/ /ming ni ci la rab tu gnas/ /mi mgon tshig ni thos pa dang / /rdo rje'i snying pos de la smras/ /
'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas/ /brjod las tha dad gyur pa yi/ /brjod par bya ba yod pa min/ /phung po bzhi po ming yin te/ /gzugs kyang tsam zhes rnam par brtag /
tsam la ming du btags pa ni/ /skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba ste/ /tsam la mtshan ma zhes bya bar/ /rgyal ba rgyal sras dag gis gsungs/ /mtshan ma med par ming du ni/ /de dag rnam par rtog mi nus/ /

de bas mtshan ma rten byas shing / /ming du kun nas brtag pa yin/ /ji ltar lding dang lnga byid dang / /bar pa nga yang yod pa min/ /mtshan ma med par ci yang rung / /byis pas de la rnam mi brtag /de bzhin sa 'di thams

cad kyang / /mtshan ma med par yod pa min/ /ci yang mtshan mar mi rtog pa/ /mtshan ma yod na rnam par brtag /rdza dang snam bu shing rta dag /gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'di tsam ste/ /

gzugs tsam rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ /tsam la ming du brtags pa ste/ /'di la yang dag ming yod min/ /ming med rnam par bral bar yang / /sa rnams thub pas mthong ba na/ /rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug /rnam rtog med pa mi skye'o/ /tsher skye med

pa gzhan gyur pa/ /mi zad de la skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu med phyir na ming med de/ /'du shes tsam la rnam par rtog /de bas rgyal pos rtag par yang / /'du shes ma yin 'du shes sgoms/ /'di dag thams cad 'di

tsam ste/ /thams cad las ni gzhan med do/ /tsam ni gzugs su shes par bya/ /de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs/ /cha lugs ring dang sku yangs te/ /mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs gcig /'du shes ming dang

rnam rtog dang / /brjod dang khyad par lhan cig ste/ /tsam dang mtshan ma 'du shes su/ /spyod par rab tu gdags pa ste/ /tsam la gnas de ming rnams kyang / /kun rdzob don du rnam par brtags/ /brjod pa med par

dngos po ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /rnam shes rnams kyi 'byung ba yang / /rtogs bya med par yod pa min/ /rtogs bya ming dang tsam po ni/ /sa rnams thams cad de nyid de/ /dngos po gang la gang ming
gis/ /brtag par bya ba de bzhin med/ /'di ni chos rnams chos nyid de/ /brtags na gnas pa med pa'o/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'du shes can gyi dngos po med/ /de med pas na ming med de/ /
ming med pas na rnam mi brtag /rnam par mi rtogs zhir 'gyur ba/ /bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin te/ /khur tsas ji ltar khur bkur ba/ /de dang tha dad mtshan can te/ /de bzhin tsam ni ming

gi khur/ /de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyer/ /sems la tsam zhes rnam par brtags/ /ming gis tsam du sems tsam gyis/ /'di ni skyes bu sdong po zhes/ /ci yang rung ste ming tsam brtag /'byung ba rnams dang 'dus

pa dang / /tsam yang gzugs la rnam par brtag /tsam po med par 'byung ba yi/ /tsam zhes bya ba mi dmigs te/ /bum pa'i ngos la yon tan ltar/ /tsam la ming ni rnam par gnas/ /bum pa bum pa'i dngos po yis/

rnam par dben zhing ming dang bral/ /bum pa bum pa'i dngos por ram/ /ming yang ming du gnas pa med/ /rnal 'byor can gyis gang gi tshe/ /ming tsam g.yo ba med pa dang / /rnam rtog gnyis dang 'brel pa yi/ /ming tsam

yod med mthong ba na/ /ji ltar me ldan lcags rnams dang / /spra tshil dag kyang rgya skyegs kyang / /chu dang mnyam par khu bar 'gyur/ /'on kyang chu yi yon tan med/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /rnam shes
bdun dang lhan cig tu/ /rtag tu las su 'jug par byed/ /rnam par shes pas yun du spangs/ /khab long rdo las rten byas shing / /lcags ni sems can bzhin 'khor yang / /de dag gnyis ka byed pa med/ /
sems can gson po bzhin du g.yo/ /sems ni bdun zhes bgrang ba yin/ /kun gzhi brgyad pa de bzhin no/ /bag chags srad bus brgyus pas na/ /sems can bzhin g.yo sems can med/ /lus na
kun du rgyas par 'dug /'gro ba dog par 'khor ba ste/ /gcig las gcig gis mi shes pa/ /byed med lcags dang khab long bzhin/ /mgo bo du ma lce mang po/ /kha mang lag pa du ma dang / /lus kyang du mar

rab bsgyur cing / /de bzhin gshegs la mchod byed pa/ /shin du mang ba'i zhing gi rnams/ /tshad med stong du 'gro byas shing / /de dang der yang mgon po'i rnams/ /de dag kun la rtag mchod byed/ /ri rab ri dang mnyam pa

yi/ /me tog na bza' char mang po/ /sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas/ /de dag mchod pa rab tu byed/ /phreng ba phreng phyed cod pan dang / /rin chen brgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen dang rgyal sras la/ /rtag

par mchod pa rab tu byed/ /sprin lta bu yi gzhal med khang / /sna tshogs mang po'i gzugs 'gyur ba/ /mtha' ma nam mkha'i mu dang mnyam/ /gzhan yang rdul phran rdul snyed kyi/ /sprul mang lha yi bu mo yis/ /
rol mo sil snyan rab bsgrags te/ /gzhal med dag la mngon gnas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed/ /stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob cing / /dog pa'i sa nas ma nyams pa/ /chos kyi sprin las 'thon
gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa'i rnams/ /sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam bzhag ste/ /gzungs la mkhas par gyur pa'i rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed/ /

sangs rgyas yang dag brjod mos rnams/ /mtha' yas zhing du 'gro byas shing / /yang dag yon tan ldan pa dag /sangs rgyas yon tan rab tu rjod/ /dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste/ /rgyal ba dag dang thabs
gcig tu/ /rgyal sras so so rang rig pa'i/ /rtogs par bya ba'i ting 'dzin sgom/ /gnas gzhan gyur pa'i yon tan can/ chos la bdag med ston pa'i rnams/ /spros pa thams cad rgyun bcad cing / /

dam pa'i don la rnam sgom pa/ /chos lnga rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / /rnam shes brgyad la'ang de bzhin te/ /mkhas pa byas par rtag gyur cing / /mnyam par bzhag rnams mchod par byed/ /shin du phra ba'i rdul 'dra dang / /

de bzhin chen po'i lus kyis kyang / /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed/ /sa rnams kun ka bdag lus dang / /yungs kar 'brur yang rab 'dzud byed/ /rgya mtsho ba lang rjesu

byed/ /ba lang rjes kyang gang chen mtshor/ /spu gcig rtse mor brtan g.yo ba'i/ /'gro ba rab tu 'dzud byed kyang / /gnod par byed pa ma yin te/ /'gro ba dag na rnam par spyod/ /longs spyod can gyi skyid longs yul/ /

nyi zla sa dang mnyam pa ste/ /'tshig med sa dang 'dra bar yang / /rnam pa kun gyis phan 'dogs shing / /me dang rlung dag 'dra ba ste/ /rtag tu chu dang sman 'dra ba/ /rin chen khams kyi 'byung khungs ltar/ /sems can
kun kyang nye bar 'tsho/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags pa med/ /ma chad rtag pa'ang med pa ste/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /'gro med 'ong ba med pa'i rnams/ /rnam par brtags pa'i ming dag dang / /

kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ /ming dang ming med rnam spangs dag /sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam 'dra/ /dri za'i grong khyer dpe bzhin te/ /smig rgyu chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /rang bzhin

kun du brtags pa dag /glog dang sprin dang du ba dang / /mgal pa'i 'khor lo smig rgyu 'dra/ /'di tshul brtags pa'i chos rnams ni/ /rang bzhin kun du brtags pa ste/ /gang dang gang gi ming rnams kyis/ /
chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa/ /de ni de na yod pa min/ /kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'gro ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /rjod pa dang ni tha dad pa/ /brjod par
bya ba gang yang med/ /'di ni sa yi rang bzhin te/ /kun du brtags pa rab tu bstan/ /mig dang gzugs las brten byas shing / /gsum las yid de 'byung ba yin/ /rnga sgra me ni 'du
'phrod las/ /myu gu sa bon sa las rim/ /khang pa la sogs sna tshogs dang / /snam bu rdza la sogs pa dang / /lus can rnams dang chos rnams kyi/ /'di ni rang bzhin gzhan dbang ngo / /

don rnams dor ba med pa dang / /gang yang zag pa med pa'i chos/ /so so rang rig rgyud rnams dang / /chos la bdag med nyid dang ni/ /thams cad chos gyi grub pa ste/ /rang bzhin du ni de brtags so/ /rang
bzhin gyis ni chos kyi rnams/ /tha dad mtshan du bsgrags pa ste/ /chos rnams thams cad 'dres par ni/ /rang bzhin med na rab tu 'gyur/ /gcig min rdzas rnams 'dus pa las/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos
gcig min gzugs/ /rtogs par sla ba ma yin pa'i/ /sgyu ma'i ri dgas byas pa bzhin/ /de ltar dngos po thams cad kyang / /rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags/ /rtogs par mi rung mi gcig gzugs/ /

kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /sna tshogs nor bu 'dra ba yi/ /ri dgas rdzas kyi rgyu tshogs nas/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rnam byas dang / /sems can kun gyi gzugs bzhin te/ /de ltar dngos po 'di dag kun/ /rnam par

rtogs pas rnam par brtags/ /rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba ste/ /kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs/ /tshon dang phrad na rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin sa rnams kun ka ste/ /

rtog pas rnam par brtags byas na/ /yon tan dngos su mi gnas te/ /sgyu ma rmi lam sprin dang 'dra/ /smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ste/ /kun du brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar dri za'i khang pa dag /khang pa ma

yin khang par snang / /rgyu med par yang mi snang ste/ /de bzhin sa rnams sna tshogs nyid/ /nyi zla gzhal yas khang rnams dang / /tha mal ri dang rin chen ri/ /du ba sprin gyi gnod pas ni/ /nams kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te/ /

bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las/ /rtog pas rnam par brtag byas na/ /dngos nyid mi 'grub dngos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin kun du brtag pa'o/ /rgyu las dngos po mi 'byung ste/ /rgyu med las kyang ma yin no/ /

rang bzhin zhes bya rnam rtog ste/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par brtags/ /mtshan ma la ni ming rten te/ /gnyis la rnam par rtog pa gnas/ /yang dag shes dang de bzhin nyid/ /rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'o/ /sems
ni mtshan ma 'dra ba ste/ /mtshan ma yid la gnas pa yin/ /yid la sems rnams lnga po ni/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /sems ni bag chags rgyu ba ste/ /bag chags rnams la thog ma med/ /thog ma
med pa'i blo yi yul/ /yul ni sems kyi nor ba'o/ /sems ni yul dang 'dra ba ste/ /sa rnams yul zhes bya ba yin/ /thams cad sa bon kun gzhi la/ /rnam par shes pa kun kyang gnas/ /rnam shes bdun po
kun gzhi las/ /rab tu 'byung ngo phan tshun dang / /sems kyi rnams dang kun gzhi la/ /rtag med chad pa'ang med pa ste/ /sa rnams thams cad kun gzhi yin/ /bar snang rnam par gnas pa ste/ /gsum po 'dus

pa'i rkyen byung ba/ /bdag dang dbang po dag las byung / /lus can rnams kyi rnam shes ni/ /yul rnams rnyed nas 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni rtog pa can gyi tshul/ /rgyu dang las kyi rgyus byung ba/ /dbang po sa rnams

thams cad dang / /tshangs la sogs pa phyi rol dang / /de dag lha min las kyang min/ /rdul phran gyis kyang sa ma byas/ /sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi nyid/ /lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba yin/ /rkyen rnams kun gzhi
ma byas te/ /rkyen gyis kun gzhi byas pa min/ /'di dag la ni gsum 'dus med/ /rnam shes 'on kyang 'khor ba ste/ /shel 'dra zla ba bzhin du yang / /rnam shes
rnams dang lhan cig rgyu/ /bag chags byung ba'i rnam shes dang / /kun gzhi rtag tu 'grogs pa ni/ /zla ba spyang gis zin pa bzhin/ /rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu/ /bag chags de las langs pa
yis/ /rgyas par byed do yang dang yang / /rgyas pa gzhan yang rgyas byed de/ /de la'ang gzhan gyis yang dang yang / /de ltar rab tu 'jug pa'i sems/ /mthong nas sems de rnam par ldog /mi brtan yul
la kun nas 'brel/ /khab long rdo la lcags bzhin te/ /kun gyi gzhi la sems yod pa/ /zag bcas zag pa med pa dag /bag chags dag gis bsgos pa'i rnams/ /'jug dang phyir ldog byed

pa yin/ /ji ltar bsreg las me bus shing / /gzhan du me yang rab tu bud/ /de dang gzhan du de bzhin bud/ /de dag nas kyang spo bzhin dang / /de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes dang / /gzhan yang de las byung ba
rnams/ /chos la rab tu rgyu ba ni/ /gtogs dang zag pa med pa dag /mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa yi/ /yul dang yul can de yin te/ /'phags pa mthong ba'i chos can gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang 'di

dag yin/ /'phags pa de dag de ldan zhing / /sgom dang mthong ba ldan pas na/ /chos kun de bzhin nyid shas pa/ /zhing nas zhing du rab tu 'dong / /ji ltar shin du bzang ba'i gser/ /gser gyi dbyings na mi
snang ste/ /brtsal bas shin tu zhib btags nas/ /yongs su sbyangs na snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /rnam par shes pa bdun dang bcas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs sbyangs pa'i/ /

rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ji ltar ma bsrubs zho la yang / /de na mar yod mi snang ste/ /bsrub pa'i tshul gyis mthong bas na/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de phyir bsrub/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par
shes/ /rnam shes bdun dang ldan pa yang / /rnam par bsrubs shing stug spyod pa'i/ /thub pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin/ /ma rig pa ni sdug ces bya/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes rnam grangs te/ /dkyil
'khor 'di la bslabs pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can rnams sdug por 'dong / /gzugs med gzugs yod nam mkha' dang / /rnam shes 'du shes ma yod dag /rnal 'byor can gyis yul bsgoms sam/ /de dag

stug po'i zhing du 'dong / /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od bzhin du/ /'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /rnam 'byor can gyi thub ston cing / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun kyi dbang bskur bas/ /

de ni dbang bskur stug por song / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rjes su mthong / /gzhan du gyur nas stug por song / /stug na gnas shing sprul pa dang / /sprul pa'i sprul pa de dag gis/ /gang na gang chos su 'dod pa/ /

de ni mkha' la 'dug cing ston/ /sngon med dus kyi gnas ngan len/ /bag chags rgyu yis bsags pa yi/ /kun gzhi rnam rtog byas pa yis/ /bcings pa kun du rab tu 'byung / /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams/

rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa dag /rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung / /rnam shes de bzhin kun gzhi la/ /rnam shes de ni des byas pa'i/ /bag chags rnams kyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /'byung zhing la la phyir ldog
ste/ /chad med rtag pa med pa'o/ /rang sems khong du ma chud pas/ /yul la gzhol ba'i rnam shes rnams/ /rab tu zhugs kyang phyir ldog pa/ /'gro ba rang sems mthong ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gzhan du
gyur pa'i sems/ /me dang bsreg pa ji bzhin te/ /kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba yang / /gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med/ /zag med 'gros su song ba dang / /'phags pa'i rigs su
skye bar 'gyur/ /kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba ni/ /sa rnams khyab par byas shing gnas/ /yid ni bdag la bdag ces te/ /ngar sems rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /rnam shes kha dog khyad par dang / /kun du
gcod pa rab tu byed/ /sems ni las rnams sogs pa ste/ /yid ni khong du chud par byed/ /rnam par shes pas rnam par rig /lnga pos snang ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /rab rib ldan pa myos pa yis/ /ji ltar
skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin/ /gzugs la sogs la gzugs med de/ /sems ni gzugs ltar gnas pa yin/ /nyi ma zla ba'i nor bu dag /yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /nyi zla'i zer gyis phog pa

dang / /de dag rang gi yon tan 'byin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge snying po/ /zag med legs dang ldan gyur te/ /gzhan du 'gyur na rab tu 'byin/ /'di ltar snang ba gang yang rung /
mtshan ma gzugs su snang ba'i rnams/ /bag chags yog pa'i kun gzhi ste/ /sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas/ ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa dang / /yon tan zho dang dar bar snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes
kyang / /rnam par gyur nas gzugs ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rab rib ldan pas skra/ /mig gi nyes pas rnam mthong ba/ /de bzhin bag chags nyes ldan pa'i/ /kun gzhi lus can rnam skyi ste/ /rtag tu mig
gi nang song ba'i/ /gzugs kyis snang bar rab tu 'jug /'di dag snang ba ci 'ang rung / /smig rgyu chu yi dpe bzhin te/ /gzugs ni yod dang med kyis spangs/ /kun gzhi rjes su mthong ba'o/ /mig dang
gzugs las rten byas shing / /de ni sgyu ma bzhin du 'byung / /rtag tu mig gi nang song ba/ /smig rgyu bzhin du rab tu g.yo/ /gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs/ /kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas
pa ste/ /byis pa ji ltar brtags pa bzhin/ /gzugs ni gud na yod pa min/ /byed med sems pa'ang med pa ste/ /dbu ba'i phung po bzhin du gnas/ /gnyid log ra ro dregs pa dang / /'gro 'dug rnam par
rgyug pa yi/ /lus can rnams kyi kun gzhi'o/ /ji ltar gdung bas bsar sa las/ /gyen du ldang ba'i smig rgyu rnams/ /dpyid ka'i chu ltar rab tu g.yo/ /ri dgas rnams la slu bar byed/ /de bzhin
kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /gzugs min lta ba'i spyod yul du/ /gzugs snang ji ltar rtog can gyis/ /brtags bzhin gzugs 'dra ma yin no/ /ji ltar khab long mthong ba dang / /lcags ni
myur bar kun du 'khor/ /'on kyang de la sems pa med/ /sems ldan bzhin du'ang rab tu snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /sems med sems can ji bzhin du/ /'gro dang 'ong bar g.yo
ba ste/ /sa rnams 'bri bar rab tu byed/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho dza ru ni/ /srog med par yang g.yo 'gul te/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /lus la gnas shing g.yo bar gyur/ /glang po glang po'i
gzugs brnyan dang / /ji ltar 'thab cing choms nas min/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /'jug pa choms nas mi rgyu'o/ /ji ltar pad mo dri med pa/ /'dam gyi nang nas byung ba ni/ /mi dang lha
dang btsun la 'os/ /lha yul gnas pa kun kyang 'dod/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /bag chags 'dam nas byung ba ni/ /rnam dag gzhan du gnas gyur pa/ /bdag nyid che rnams 'dod pa yin/ /
ji ltar rin chen rnam par dag /ri brags mi yis bcags brdungs kyang / /rgyal po'i cod pan du 'ang 'os/ /cod pan la yang gdags pa yin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /
bag chags rnams kyis bcags brdungs pa/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te/ /sangs rgyas nyid du de gzung ngo / /ji ltar chu gting rdo ba dag /nya lcibs dag gis yongs dkris pa/ /de bzhin
kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /bag chags dri ma can du byas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang / /dngos po gnyis kyis rab tu 'jug /ji ltar kha gnyis yod pa'i sbrul/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'gro
ste/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /rim dang cig car rgyu ba yin/ /rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu/ /de la rtog pas rnam par brtag /rtog can rnam par myos 'gyur ba/ /bdag dang bdag gir

rnam rtog cing / /yod dang med kyi rgyu sdod pa'i/ /sa rnams la yang rnam rtog ste/ /'gyur ba'i yongs su gyur pa dang / /kun gzhi zab pa nyid dag kyang / /blo chung rnams kyis mi rigs pas/ /sgyu ma'i ri
dgas bzhin du 'khor/ /rang bzhin gcig min shas par dka'/ /lus can kun la 'dra ba ste/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rtag tu sgyu ma'i ri dgas 'dra/ /sems can gcig min shes par dka'/ /

yod dang med par rnam par brtag /rdul dang gtso bo skyes bu dang / /mi gsal tshangs pa'ang de yin te/ /rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtog can rnams/ /kun gzhi la ni rtag tu rtog /sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la/ /

sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog /sa la gang gis rtogs gyur pa'i/ /yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya/ /ji ltar ri mo mthon man dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gyi gzugs/ /'ja' dang ri dgas sred byed dang / /

sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin te/ /rab rib can gyi phreng ba dang / /bzang mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du/ /rmi lam dag ni rnam sna tshogs/ /dri za'i khang pa gnas rten dang / /ro langs chu yi shing rnams dang / /brag cha sprin

dang du ba dang / /me long mig la gzugs brnyan dang / /chu la chu yi zla ba dang / /rnam rtog 'di dang mang por yang / /'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog /gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar/ /rnam par sna tshogs kun
mthong ste/ /'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang / /de'i tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/ /chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi/ /bag chags snyoms las sogs pa dang / /rtog pas rnyog pa can du byas/ /gzhan
du gyur nas zag pa med/ /zag med rang lugs rab thob nas/ /de dag rtag cing brtan par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam/ /'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te/ /mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan
pa la/ /mi zag chos rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul bsam gtan rnam thar dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang / /mkhas dang stobs dang mngon shes dag /'bri med mi zad de bzhin te/ /nam
mkha' zad kyi mtha' snyigs shing / /dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang / /mthar phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing / /yid bzhin shin du brtan pa'i lus/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /gzhan du
gyur nas rab tu 'thob/ /'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin/ /sems can yod min skye ba med/ /'bri med gang ba med par yang / /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro bar bshad/ /zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi/ /

chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste/ /skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang / /chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin gnas/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa grol ba la/ /rtag med chad pa med pa ste/ /sems can khams rnams zhig gyur na/
thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo / /ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang / /'das dang da ltar byung ba dag /mnyam pa ma yin 'thun pa min/ /shes bya zad nas de dag 'byung / /bdud rnams tshar bcad log
pa ste/ /brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang / /de ste sems can 'jig na ni/ /sdug bsngal spungs las mi 'grol lo/ /lcags kyi gar bu bsregs pa las/ /me las byung ste bsil gyur cing / /lcags

ni rtag par 'dug pa bzhin/ /de ltar rnal 'byor can dag 'khod/ /phung po'i khyim dang des byung ba'i/ /bag chags rnams kyang 'gag pa dang / /thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams/ /de dag rtag cing grol ba yin/

rnam shes rnams ni dba' rlabs bzhin/ /kun gzhi mtsho las 'byung ba ste/ /chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis/ /rab tu bskyod cing shin du rgyu/ /gnas ngan len gyi spros pa yis/ /bcom pa gnas med don gyi
gzugs/ /lta ba'i yul du rnam par g.yo/ /de ltar shes nas phyir log ste/ /gzhan gyur mi bzad rtag pa'i rnams/ /mgon po dag ni stug por 'dong / /stug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin/ /rtag tu gzugs
brnyan rnam par mdzes/ /phung po stug pa kun gzhi ste/ /yid ni de la nye phan no/ /rnam par shes pa rtogs par byed/ /gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu/ /rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni/ /
dbang por bcas shing yul gzhol bas/ /sna tshogs yul la 'dzin par byed/ /kun gzhi yul can ma yin no/ /tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/ /yid ni drod du rab tu gnas/ /yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/
lhag ma dbang po lngar yang gnas/ /sems dang yid dang rnam par shes/ /phung po'i dbus na rnam par gnas/ /bag chags las dang 'brel ba'i rnams/ /sngan chad byas pa rnams kyis 'byung / /'dod
chags sred las byung ba yi/ /las kyis bya ba byed pa ste/ /sngon chad de dag las byas pas/ /rgyun du las rnams 'byung ba yin/ /lus las lus ni gzhan la 'gro/ /'pho ba srin bu pad ma bzhin/ /sems

dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnams/ /rgyun chags par ni shin du 'dong / /yang zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams dang / /rnam shes srid pa dog par yang / /tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni/ /las rnams shin du 'byung ba'i

phyir/ /tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis/ /gang tshe lus ni bor gyur pa/ /de tshe lus ni dor ba ste/ /shing bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/ /sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /ngar sems bdag nyid yid yin no/ /
